events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the engineering department based on your experience and skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your case to guide you through the process.
We completed your initial screening and found your background fits well with the requirements for our software developer role.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the next interview stages and your continued interest.
Your technical interview with the lead developer has been scheduled for April 20th, 2pm, via video call.
The technical interview has been completed successfully; the interviewers were impressed by your problem-solving skills.
We have scheduled your HR interview for April 25th at 11 am to discuss company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview went well, confirming your alignment with our values and expectations for the role.
We are pleased to offer you the software engineer position with a competitive salary and benefits package.
Thank you for your positive feedback and enthusiasm regarding the offer and company prospects.
You have formally accepted the job offer; we look forward to welcoming you to our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with orientation sessions and setup for your development environment.
The hiring process has been officially closed with your successful integration into the engineering department.
